name: Hollow Planet
description:
This game is an entry to the Inaugural Eggplant Jam.

The theme is "Going Into The Void".

Gravity's gone wonky, so you have to get out of here. Don't fall into the void. (Or the lava.)

Spacebar to jump and grapple. Left and right or A and D to go left and right.

Pixel art from https://adamatomic.itch.io/ who has cool tilesets perfect for game jams.

Fonts from https://masharcade.itch.io/ and https://nimblebeastscollective.itch.io/ .

This game was made using the LÖVE framework.
